Package com.sun.multicast.reliable.transport.lrmp

An implementation of the Light-Weight Reliable Multicast Protocol.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
LRMP_INFO This public class is used to hold LRMP version number.
LRMPPacketSocket An RMPacketSocket for the LRMP transport.
LRMPTransportProfile A TransportProfile for the LRMP transport.
 

Package com.sun.multicast.reliable.transport.lrmp Description

An implementation of the Light-Weight Reliable Multicast Protocol.
